alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 07 at 1:50PM AKDT until April 08 at 12:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up 2 inches. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until midnight AKDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. The cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibilities may drop to as low as 1/2 mile at times in blowing snow, especially early this evening. Wind will weaken by late this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
